div.div: Stevenson University vs. Delaware Valley Coll
at Doylestown, PA | James Work Memorial

tr.td: DVC wins the toss and defers to secon half, Stevenson to recieve
Brandon Snyder kickoff 45 yards to the STE25, out-of-bounds, STE ball on STE35.
Patrick Diamond rush for 5 yards to the STE40 (T. Osborne).
PENALTY DVC offside 5 yards to the STE45, 1ST DOWN STE.
